/ Election Officer Training
  • Election Officer Portal →
Welcome to the Election Officer Training website!

Fairfax County Election Officer Training: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact us. Email ElectionOfficerTraining@fairfaxcounty.gov or call 703-324-4735 (weekdays 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM). Thank you!

Past elections

These classes and materials were made for past elections and may contain outdated information and references. However, we are keeping them online as a helpful reference.

  • Classes for the November 2021 General and Special Elections
    • Frequently asked questions from OPU classes (Nov 2021)
    • Poll Pad videos (Nov 2021)
  • Classes for the June 2021 Democratic Party Primary Election
  • Classes for the November 2020 General and Special Elections
  • Classes for the June 2020 Party Primary Elections

If you have any questions or issues regarding training, call us at 703-324-4735 or email ElectionOfficerTraining@fairfaxcounty.gov. We are here to help!

About

This website was created by the Fairfax County Office of Elections.

If you are interested in serving as an election officer, you must first apply through the Election Officer Portal.

  • Election Officer Portal
  • Election Officer Application
  • Absentee Voting Information
